title: Neuropsychological Assessment for Psychiatrists
text:
Learning Objectives

Understand the role of neuropsychological assessment in psychiatric practice
Recognize the domains of cognitive functioning assessed in a neuropsychological evaluation
Interpret the results of a neuropsychological evaluation in the context of psychiatric diagnosis and treatment planning

title: Neuropsychological Assessment for Psychiatrists
text:
Reason for Referral
From you to me

Psychodiagnostic clarification ( e.g., poor response to pharmacotherapy)
To clarify the presence of cognitive deficits that may be contributing to a patient’s psychopathology
Role of neuropsychological assessment in psychiatric differential diagnosis is challenging …
